review.description: yummy foood!!!!! with friendly pleasant service :)
review.author: Angela B.

review.description: The sushi here is *far* superior than most of the high-end places I've been in Manhattan. The quality is always there, the staff is very friendly and competent. Like another poster said, the owner is usually there, and is a very nice guy. I went here one evening because Ki Sushi down the street was too crowded, and Kyoto had just opened, so gave it a try - I haven't gone back to Ki since, this place has better food and service.
review.author: Mark W.
